com.esri.mo2.util
Class Environment

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.util.Environment
Direct Known Subclasses:
ServiceEnvironment
public class Environment
extends Object

This class can be used to store and manage the Environment data that is sent between an ArcIMS server and its client.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs an Environment using default locale and font.

          Constructs an Environment using specified locale and font.

getPhysicalFont

public static Font getPhysicalFont(Font font)
                            throws IOException
Returns the physical font that is represented by the specified logical font. If the given font is not a logical font, then it is returned, with no exception thrown. This method attempts to open the JRE's font.properties, which is a privileged operation.

Parameters:
font - the logical font
Returns:
the physical font
Throws:
IOException - for any i/o errors

getCurrentScreenResolution

public static int getCurrentScreenResolution()
Returns the current screen resolution for the present session.

Returns:
the current session's screen resolution
